welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Leusden, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes, friendly locals, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our vibrant city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Schiphol's main terminal, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Dedicated to European flights, with a focus on low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serving mainly long-haul flights, with a focus on non-European destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Dedicated to SkyTeam airlines, with a focus on connecting flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serving mainly low-cost and charter flights, with a focus on leisure destinations.

wifi.note: No password required, but a login is needed every 30 minutes.
